metadata.title: CVE-2018-14722 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in evaluate_auto_mountpoint in btrfsmaintenance-functions in btrfsmaintenance through 0.4.1. Code execution as root can occur via a specially crafted filesystem label if btrfs-{scrub,balance,trim} are set to auto in /etc/sysconfig/btrfsmaintenance (this is not the default, though).

criterions.comment: btrfsmaintenance package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
